_sText:
ORIGINAL TEXT:

This is my new map. So much people like mgraceparking and want a new race map. This new race is more big than mgraceparking. Player can't fight during the first race, if you hit a obstacle, you will be teleported in the jail with weapon (cut/gun/pm/rifle/...). This new version is call "extended" because the race is slighty longer than the first version. The jail has been improve and final jail-room get a button for restart the race. One more music was added (Just Jack - Basement) and there is the opportunity to play a round without music. Here is the list of the music : - Poperotik - B*tch plz - M83 - Midnight city - PSY - Gangnam Style - Just Jack - Basement Thanks to Crazy Gaming team. Note : The .rar contains the map and the .bak. is not necessary for play.

NOTE:
In this version of the map, the exploit still exists where you can get out of the map. Some old CS:GO mg servers kept it because it was fun. If you want the fixed version of the map without the exploit, go here.

Ported from CS:GO with permission granted.
